content: **knitted jumper in drops sky piece is knitted top down with raglan and short sleeves with lace pattern size s - xxxl** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern skip-076 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops sky from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 250-300-300-350-350-400 g colour 19 brick **knitting gauge ** 21 stitches in width and 28 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 4 mm drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 and 60 or 80 cm for stocking stitch drops double pointed needles size 3 mm drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 and 80 cm for rib needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to a larger needle size if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to a smaller needle size
